CustomField.formula: CASE(TEXT(Order.Region__c), '3', KLWSpec__r.NameForDoc__r.NameRU__c + ' ' + Drawing__r.AxLoadType__r.Name, '19', KLWSpec__r.NameForDoc__r.NameRU__c + ' ' + Drawing__r.AxLoadType__r.Name, '13', KLWSpec__r.NameForDoc__r.NameUA__c + ' ' + Drawing__r.AxLoadType__r.Name, KLWSpec__r.NameForDoc__r.NameEN__c + ' ' + Drawing__r.AxLoadType__r.Name )
CustomField.label: Name for Doc Formula
